EmailTemplate.name: Missed Delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: Philadelphia Inquirer - Missed Delivery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, {!Contact.FirstName}:
We sincerely apologize for the missed delivery you experienced. A credit has been applied to your account for the missed delivery, and a message has been sent to the field in order to ensure this is resolved for you going forward. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Don't forget you may report a missed delivery, schedule a vacation, and access the Digital Replica Editions by going to the Subscriber Service Website: https://myaccount.philly.com
